===Definitions===

# {{lb|zh|formal}} [[female]] (describing animals)

====Usage notes====
* Commonly used for animals to mean "female" in academic contexts, less commonly used in non-academic contexts (use "{{lang|zh|母}}" instead), and not used for humans (use "{{lang|zh|女}}" instead). For example:
*: {{zh-x|母雞|hen}}
*: {{zh-x|母牛|cow}}

====Antonyms====
